## [iqKM](https://github.com/lijingdi/iqKM/tree/master): A Python Package for **Identification and Quantification of KEGG Modules**

***iqKM*** is an easy to use pipeline to assign and/or quantify KEGG
Orthology (KO) and KEGG modules (KMs) in metagenomes. Detailed pipeline
below.
